items.parent_question: Directions : In each of the following questions, a number series is given with one term missing. Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and fill in the blank spaces.

cases.case_name: Finding the Wrong Term in the Given Series

items.parent_question: Directions : In each of the following questions, one term in the number series is wrong. Find out the wrong term.
Directions : In each of the following number series, either one term is missing or is wrong which has been given as one of the four alternatives under it. This alternative is your answer.

Directions : In each of the followsing number series, two terms have been put within brackets. Mark your answer as
(a) if both the bracketed terms are right;
(b) if the first bracketed term is right and second is wrong;
(c) if the first bracketed term is wrong and second is right;
(d) if both the bracketed terms are wrong.

G4T, J10R, M20P, P43N, S90L

cases.case_name: To form the code for another word (CODING)

items.parent_question:
Directions : Below, the word EXPAND has been written four different codes by applying four different rules which are given as four alternatives against it. In each of the questions which follow, a word has been written in one of these codes. Find the alternative applicable to each word and mark your answer.

EXPAND

(a) FYQBOE
(b) EPDTCR
(c) GYRBPE
(d) CWNZLC
